DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission.name: DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission
DataIntegrationRecordPurchasePermission.description: Represents Lightning Data purchase credits that a Salesforce admin has granted to users.

ExternalObject.description: This field can hold a single value: the name of the data service record matched to the Salesforce record.

UserId.description: The ID of a user to whom purchase credits are assigned.

UserRecordPurchaseLimit.description: The number of purchase credits assigned to a user.
